SELECT a.id, a.title, a.abs, ct.content, a.cover, a.views, a.top, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.delete_time, c.id as category_id, c.name as category_name, c.count as category_count, t.id as tag_id, t.name as tag_name, t.count as tag_count from article a LEFT JOIN content ct on a.content_id=ct.id LEFT JOIN category c on a.category_id=c.id LEFT JOIN article_tag art on a.id=art.article_id LEFT JOIN tag t on art.tag_id=t.id where 1=1
and a.title like concat('%'#{title},'%')
and a.top=#{top},
and a.create_time=#{createTime},
and a.update_time=#{createTime}
and a.delete_time=#{deleteTime}
order by a.create_time desc
